game - Variable in class es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.Command
A reference to a game object.
game - Variable in class es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.Engine
A reference to the game that created the Interpreter
Game - Class in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4
Represents the state of all the elements of the game (locations, items, player inventory, etc.), and relevant constants for the game (the available movement directions, the keywords for a game textual definition, etc.).
Game(String, String, String, Location) - Constructor for class es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.Game
Constructs a game using some basic information (a given title, a given author and a given description) and an initial location.
Game(InputStream) - Constructor for class es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.Game
Constructs a game, based on a textual definition of it.
game - Variable in class es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.Parser
A reference to the game that created the Interpreter
game - Variable in class es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.SAXHandler
 
Game.Direction - Enum in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4
Represents all the possible directions for the connections between locations: NORTH, NORTHEAST, EAST, SOUTHEAST, SOUTH, SOUTHWEST, WEST, NORTHWEST, UP, DOWN, IN and OUT.
Game.Direction(String) - Constructor for enum es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.Game.Direction
